name: Game AI project -A*
description:
Made by Haoyang Liu

If you need only tile A*, please use build1 (fast)

If both tile and Waypoint is needed, please use build2 (slow)

use mouse scrollwheel to zoom, arrow key and wasd to move around the map.

You have to click Set Start/Set End to set the start and finish points/tiles.

Please wait for the map to be processed, then start A* algorithm.

Sorry for no WebGL builds. It have to use file system so it cannot be WebGL.

github Page
